steps.name: User clicks the login button
The user enters the e-mail address registered in the system for e-mail otp.
The user enters the password registered in the system for e-mail otp.
The user clicks the login button.
Users enters mail verification code
Clicks the Send button
User clicks phone add button
User clicks skip button
User clicks on the search transaction pair box on the opened page
Type the cryptocurrency to swap into the search box
The user clicks on the cryptocurrency to trade.
The user clicks on the dropdown in the swap section of the cryptocurrency detail page.
The user selects USDT from the box at the top of the cryptocurrency list
User types BTC in the asset search box
User clicks on BTC-USTD swap in the incoming table
The user verifies that the trading pairs to be swapped are BTC-USDT
The user enters the amount of money they want to exchange into the calculator
The user verifies that the amount entered in the calculator is displayed
The user validates the value of the approximate amount they want to swap using the approximate price information displayed on the ui
User confirms that the buy text is clickable

name: Validate with e-mail otp that a swap of USDT to BTC is executed successfully, with real-time rates displayed before confirmation
